DOC.brief_summary: This non-interventional , multi-centric , cross-sectional study aim determine prevalence Chronic Kidney Disease Indian patient Type 2 Diabetes ( T2DM ) . 3000 patient enrol 30 investigative site country . Each investigative site expect enrol 100 subject . All procedure complete single day .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational , Cross Sectional Study Assess Prevalence Chronic Kidney Disease ( CKD ) Type 2 Diabetes Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This observational , multicenter , cross-sectional study conduct 30 site India . Endocrinologist/ Diabetologist multiple private clinic evaluate Type 2 Diabetes patient . The study conduct 9-10 month start obtain write approval Independent Ethics Committee ( IEC ) write Informed consent patient . . Each investigative site expect enrol 100 subject . All procedure complete single day .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Known case T2DM . 2 . Male female patient age 18 year . 3 . Must provide write Informed consent . 1 . Patients know type1 diabetes . 2 . Patients form acute kidney injury base investigator 's discretion . 3 . Patients maintenance dialysis know renal transplant patient . 4 . Patients participate interventional study within past 3 month prior entry study . 5 . Pregnant woman . 6 . Patients symptomatic Urinary Tract Infection ( UTI ) history hematuria .
